nodes.text: The Battle of Kryndyn was an engagement on the planet Zelos II in the year 4 BBY. A horde of nocturnal predators attacked the capital city of Kryndyn, killing the planetary leadership. General Galleros Nul of the Zelosian Home Defense Force rallied his forces and counterattacked, driving the beasts out of the city. The action led him to declare martial law on the planet, and install himself as the Mandated Commander of the People of Zelos.
